member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_REDIRECTION_TRUST_POLICY
member.summary: Contains process mitigation policy settings for RedirectionGuard.

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_REDIRECTION_TRUST_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.EnforceRedirectionTrust
member.summary: Set (0x1) to prevent the process from following filesystem junctions created by non-admin users and log the attempt; otherwise leave unset (0x0).

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_REDIRECTION_TRUST_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.AuditRedirectionTrust
member.summary: Set (0x1) to log when the process follows filesystem junctions created by non-admin users, but still allow the operation; otherwise leave unset (0x0).
